00015 typedef enum
00016 {

00020 // Definition of quadrature formulas
00021 
00025 struct CQuadrature
00026 {
00027   int n;
00028   const double *x, *y, *z, *w;
00029 };

00118 class CIntPoint
00119 {
00120  protected:
00121   C3DMesh *imesh;       
00122   const CQuadrature *Q; 
00123   CMat<CVar> J_a,       
00124              IJ_a,      
00125              x_a;       
00126   CVar IdJ_a,           
00127        dJ_a;            
00128   CMat<double> SF,      
00129                GSF,     
00130                J,       
00131                IJ,      
00132                x;       
00133   map<int, map<int, map<int,double> > > HSF; 
00134   double IdJ,           
00135          dJ;            
00136   CVec dvec;            
00137   int *dintvec;         
00138   int indof;            
00139   int dim;              
00145   void calcJ(eval_t E);
00146   
00156   virtual void evaluate(CVec &dofvec, int *dof, CVar &val, CVec &grad, eval_t E);
00157   
00159   virtual void setGSF() = 0;
00160   
00162   virtual void setSF()  = 0;
00163   
00165   virtual bool isLinear() = 0;
00166   
00167   
00168  public:
00169   double ksi, eta, zeta; 
00170   CVar dx_a;             
00171   double dx;             
00174   CIntPoint() {};
00175   
00183   CIntPoint(C3DMesh *mesh, CQuadrature *q) { init(mesh, q); };
00184   
00186   virtual ~CIntPoint() { delete[] dintvec; };
00187   
00189   const CQuadrature *getQ() { return Q; };
00190   
00192   double getDJ() { return dJ; };
00193   
00201   void         init(C3DMesh *mesh, const CQuadrature *q, int ndof, int dm);
00202   
00208   virtual void init(C3DMesh *mesh, const CQuadrature *q) {};
00209   
00211   int          getNdof() { return indof; }
00212   
00218   virtual int  getNdof(int elem) { return indof; }
00219   
00221   virtual int  getMeshNdof() { return imesh->getNnodes(); }
00222   
00228   virtual void calcE(int elem, eval_t E) = 0;
00229   
00235   virtual void calcQP(int qp, eval_t E)  = 0;
00236   
00243   virtual void calcQP(double l1, double l2, double l3) {};
00244   
00254   void         evalBasis(int basis, CVar &val, CVec &grad, eval_t E);
00255   
00265   virtual void eval  (CVec &dof, int elem, int offset, CVar &val, CVec &grad, eval_t E);
00266   
00268   CVar getX();
00270   CVar getY();
00272   CVar getZ();
00273   
00279   inline virtual int mapDof (int elem, int dof) { return imesh->getVolumeNode(elem, dof); }; // map local to global index of degree of freedom
00280 };

00370 class C3DLinPoint : public C3DIntPoint {
00371  protected:
00372   bool isLinear() { return true; };

00377   void setSF();
00378   void calcQP(double l1, double l2, double l3) {};

00383 class C3DLinPointOnQuadMesh : public C3DLinPoint
00384 {
00385  public:
00386   C3DLinPointOnQuadMesh(C3DMesh *mesh, const CQuadrature *q) { CIntPoint::init(mesh, q, 4, 3); };
00387   inline int mapDof(int e, int n)
00388   {
00389     return ((C3DQuadMesh *)imesh)->getNoOfLnode(imesh->getVolumeNode(e, n));
00390   };
00391   inline int getMeshNdof() { return imesh->getNlnodes(); }
00392 };

00395 class C3DLinDiscPoint : public C3DLinPoint {
00396  public:
00397   C3DLinDiscPoint() {};
00398   C3DLinDiscPoint(C3DMesh *mesh, const CQuadrature *q) { CIntPoint::init(mesh, q, 4, 3); };
00399   virtual int mapDof(int e, int n) { return e*4+n; };
00400 };
